name: Spellblade Dungeon Crawler
description:
spellblade dungeon crawler (WIP)

Brackey's Game Jam 6 || Theme: Let there be chaos

I've been playing several roguelike card games like Slay the Spire, Griftlands, Banner of Ruin, Roguebook and Trials of Fire. Why not combine my favorite elements of those games into the world of Spellblade?

Adventure Options

  • Combat - Increasingly difficult mobs, most difficult monsters spawn at Day 32.
  • Shop - not implemented
  • Event - Currently placeholder, and an event "bandits!" will occur.
  • Healing - not implemented

Combat Systems:

  • Enemy: 1-6 enemies will spawn every combat.
  • Level Up: Player gains +1 weapon damage, and will learn abilities in future versions.
